title: Sold: 1887 Dan Brouthers HOF Tobin Lithographs

posts.post_title: Sold: 1887 Dan Brouthers HOF Tobin Lithographs
posts.post_content:
$Sold

1887 Tobin Lithographs B&W Watch Me Soak It Dan Brouthers  SGC 1.  #67 in all time WAR.  Probably the least expensive Brouthers card you can find.  It’s a recent pickup that doesn’t really fit my PC.

PM with questions.
Many thanks to Todd for a fast and safe delivery with a wealth of courtesy.
